website_summaries.verdict: This product may not get rid of pink eye, but it helps to relieve symptoms while you're waiting to see the doctor.
pros: Homeopathic formula stimulates body's ability to relieve symptoms
Helps temporarily reduce redness, burning, watering, swelling, and overnight crusting
May also help relieve symptoms from styes
cons: Intended to relieve symptoms, but may not be able to get rid of infection
Manufacturer advises to discard after 30 days

customer_reviews.title: Worked like magic! P
customer_reviews.text: I used these eye drops 3 times the first day when they arrived. The next morning, I was in shock to wake up to see my eyes completely white and cleared up! I had been dealing with red, irritated eyes for about two weeks, and was about to go to the doctor when I found these. Thank goodness! Worked like magic! P.S. I left my contacts in when I used this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think this gets rid of pink eye but ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this gets rid of pink eye but it certainly made it more bearable. After a week I still had mild symptoms and needed an actual prescription from my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Hello kitty penu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MYHISBAND SWEARS BY THIS STUFF, NEVERNEED A DR. JUST USES THE DROPS AND IT CLEARS UP.

customer_reviews.text: This did not help me and my eye doctor was not keen on the ingredients in this- he said it was harmful

customer_reviews.title: This helped a minor case within hours
customer_reviews.text: I had a very minor pink eye case and this improved swelling and irritation within hours, and prevented crust overnight. Did not sting. Will definitely keep on hand for future issues.

customer_reviews.title: It helped a little, used it twice already, ...
customer_reviews.text: It helped a little, used it twice already, but it did not help get the red out as much as I had hoped for. I have serious eye strain from the computer...

customer_reviews.title: I was suffering from allergy induced pink eye and honestly ...
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from allergy induced pink eye and honestly this product didn't do much for my symptoms. I took the drops as described on the bottle, but I ended up getting more relief from allergy drops. I can't speak for how this will work on bacterial infections.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw your money away.
customer_reviews.text: This product is just glorified eye drops. Does nothing to help cure Conjunctivitis or Pink Eye. Don't waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: absolutely not
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt buy again. There is no dropper. U would hv to drill a hole in the top and then it would be open to the air. What the heck?
customer_reviews.author: Dansko lover

customer_reviews.title: Most effective migraine prevention I've tried including prescription drugs
customer_reviews.text: I take 3 of these tablets daily. As long as I do this I have half the number of migraine headaches I had prior to taking this product. Even prescription medications were less effective. To award 5 stars I would have to have zero headaches. A tall order from someone who once had daily migraines. Note that the recommended dosage is 2 tablets daily, but 3 are required to be effective for my headaches.
customer_reviews.author: mckaws

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.

I don't normally write reviews but this is a outstanding product.

customer_reviews.title: What a complete waste! I'd give it ZERO stars if I could

customer_reviews.author: JKM

product_meta.title: TRP Company Eye Relief, Pink, 0.33 Ounce
product_meta.description: Need Relief from pink eye symptoms? Pinkeye Relief is a homeopathic, sterile eye drop is used to provide temporary relief from redness, burning, watering, inflammation, sensation of grittiness and overnight crusting in the eyes. This homeopathic formula stimulates the body's natural ability to temporarily relieve these symptoms. Contains safe ALL Natural active ingredients. All active homeopathic ingredients listed in the drug facts panel are manufactured according to the strict guidelines of the homeopathic pharmacopoeia of the United States, the guiding reference for regulating of homeopathic medicines. Individual results may vary. Can take up to 60 days to see results
feature_bullets: Temporarily Relieves Redness, Burning Sensations, Watering and Swelling of the Eyes, Sensations of Grittiness and Overnight Crusting
5 Natural active Ingredients that target pink eye symptoms
May be used in conjunction with other eye drops.
PinkEye Reliefis a homeopathic, sterile eye drop used to provide temporary relief from redness, burning, watering, inflammation, sensation of grittiness and overnight crusting in the eyes
This homeopathic formula stimulates the body's natural ability to temporarily relieve these symptoms
